page.title: 17WARD'S NURSERY/THE OLD FORGE
page.content: The Ward family has been connected with Sarrat for many years,with woodland being planned and planted by Frederick Ward early in this Century. Ward's Nursery was previously a chicken farm,but its use was changed in 1933. The nursery now occupies 10 acres of land. Trees and shrubs form the greater percentage of sales,with women forming the larger fraction of customers. The busiest days at the nursery are at the weekend. THE OLD FORGE: On the wall outside the Old Forge,it has the date 1663. But this has nothing to do with the house, as it was built in 1500. The Forge was extended in the 1920's. At the bottom of the field belonging to the Forge was a building which was used by a witches' covern,this was burnt down by the villagers,early in this century.
